name: Outside Inside Backpack 4-in-a-Row
description: Bring the fun to basecamp rest days or rainy days in the tent. This 2-person game packs up so small that you'll hardly notice it in your pack.Includes game board, 42 pucks, instructions and a carry bag.Collapsible, compact design slides easily into backpack pockets.Open dimensions are 13 x 10 x 7.5cm
